overview: The perfection of a smoothly-working relationship is hard to maintain when both sides tend to cheat on their partner. The situation can easily get worse if one of them is directly caught fucking with their lover. However, dont you think that these fucking dudes and bitches can ever be stricken with the feeling of remorse. On the contrary, they are happy to involve everyone in this chaos until the last drop of cum is spread on each others skin.
title: Complicated Affairs
